content:
Action:5

I am moving up from (7,1) to (6,1) to begin navigating toward the key by approaching from above, which keeps in line with our strategy to avoid the wall at (7,5) and reach the key at (7,6).

Action:5

I'm moving upward from (7,1) to (6,1) to start navigating around the wall and eventually approach the key at (7,6).

Action:5

I am moving UP to reach row5 so I can later navigate right toward column 6 and then down to grab the key, aligning with the strategy to bypass the wall.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (5,1) to head along the clear corridor toward the key at (7,6), expecting that continued right moves then downward will guide me safely to the key.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (5,1) toward (5,2) to begin progressing along the clear path to the key at (7,6), expecting to advance toward the objective.

``` Action:3 ```
I’m moving right from (5,2) toward the key by progressing along row 5, expecting the avatar to eventually reach (5,3) and continue right along the planned path.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (5,3) toward (5,4) to start heading toward the key at (7,6), following the planned safe path through the maze.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (5,4) to (5,5) to begin navigating toward the key at (7,6), aligning with our strategy of collecting the key before heading to the door.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (5,5) to (5,6) on floor space so I can later go down from (5,6) toward (6,6) and then reach the key at (7,6).

Action:4

I'm moving down from row5, col6 to row6, col6 in order to approach the key at row7, col6, which aligns with our goal of acquiring the key before heading to the door.

Action:4

I'm moving down from row 5, col 6 towards row 6, col 6, heading in the direction of the key at row 7, col 6 as per our strategy.

Action:4

I’m moving down from (6,6) toward the object at (7,6), expecting to pick up the key (despite its enemy traits) so that I can later reach the door and win the level.
